tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE corporate_governance_risk_assessment (
    company_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(100),
    governance_rating INTEGER,
    financial_performance_rating INTEGER,
    board_diversity_rating INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    year INT,
    data_type TEXT,
    data_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE outcomes (
    outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    year INT,
    outcome_type TEXT,
    outcome_value TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  governance_practice VARCHAR(255),
  outcome VARCHAR(255),
  risk_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE governance_practices (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  practice_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  classification VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE outcomes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  outcome_type VARCHAR(255),
  impact VARCHAR(255),
  relevance INT
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  year INT,
  data TEXT,
  source VARCHAR(255)
)
